Continue reading "Conversation with Self"
item.content:encoded:
– Conversation with Self

How does one analyse what they want? What do they want to achieve and what is stopping them from achieving their dreams and goals? Nobody comes forward to tell them all this. Nobody guides them.

All this happens because that one person has a conversation with oneself. A conversation where he/she knows what is their weakness and what is their strength! The person then starts evaluating the situation and take necessary steps.

It is important to have conversation with oneself and nobody knows you better than you yourself. Others may show you the way but whether that way will take you to your destination or not that is your decision.

A path of your life is carved by you alone.

A path of your journey has to be taken by you alone.

Have a self-talk to visualize your journey …Your path!

mukta sadana

A facilitator by profession, a passionate cook by hobby and a writer by choice. Random phrases or sentences, or a scenery, invoke the words in me and I express myself through my words. What I see around, what I hear and what I feel are the main reasons for why I write.
